description: A customizable modal component used to display content in a dialog. The component supports a 'header', 'content', and 'footer' <slot> for injecting custom HTML

properties.name: backdrop
properties.description: The modal's backdrop. Specify 'static' for a backdrop that doesn't close the modal when clicked outside the modal content.

properties.name: fullscreen
properties.description: Specifies whether the modal should be displayed full-screen

properties.name: modalId
properties.description: The ID of the inner dialog element

properties.name: position
properties.description: Specifies the position of the modal

properties.name: showClose
properties.description: Specifies whether to show the close icon button at the top right of modal

properties.name: showFullscreenToggle
properties.description: Specifies whether to show the fullscreen toggle icon button
